title: Huge Display of Tobacco Cards at National
author: Steve_NY

posts.post_title: Huge Display of Tobacco Cards at National
posts.post_content:
I will be set up at Booth 508P at this year's National 6 booths in from the door. My display will include over 300-400 T 206's, many T 205's and T207's, and lots of other T cards.

I have a T205 set for sale. Check out my other post for my sale on this item.

Stop by.

Steve

Raw. 

I have been selling cards since 1976 and have never jumped on board for graded cards. I do have some but they were bought from others.

Why do I not grade cards? We can discuss in person but I won't enter that debate online.

Best !

Steve
Hi Steve! Keep up the good work by not having your cards graded! I love them that way! See you at the National!   Marc  :)
